QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, case when biomarker_source != '' or biomarker_source is not null then concat(concat(biomarker,'|'), biomarker_source) else biomarker end as source_value, encounterdate, numeric_result, variant, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, 0 concept_id FROM {sc}.alz_biomarker l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
